description:
You've figured out that in order for your product to be outstanding, you need to be able to deliver frequently to production.
That's great, but how can you achieve such a goal for highly complex products?

In this session, we’ll share the Oracle Ravello kitchen recipe: take a pinch of culture, a dash of org structure, two spoonful of tools and a hint of architecture, run some lightweight processes, and hopefully get something delicious.
title: A Practical Recipe for a Continuously Delivering Organization - Gil Hoffer at DevconTLV 10
